Package menus

Class Screen

java.lang.Object
menus.Screen
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelFive, LevelFour, LevelMenu, LevelOne, LevelSeven, LevelSix, LevelThree, LevelTwo, MainMenu, ShopMenu
public abstract class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
kevinvalencia and vihaanchinthakindi Abstract class that represents any screen a user will see.

      Parameters:
